name: Xuite Blog - Content Only
description:
Xuite (http://blog.xuite.com/) is one of the biggest blog service provider in Taiwan.

I use google reader (an rss reader) to read atricles in this blog site.
But when I need to see the full article, I don't want to see other things except the content.

That why I made this style, which removes all things except the contents of the atricle.
